class.name: Label
class.brief_description: Displays plain text in a line or wrapped inside a rectangle. For formatted text, use [RichTextLabel].
class.description: Label displays plain text on the screen. It gives you control over the horizontal and vertical alignment, and can wrap the text inside the node's bounding rectangle. It doesn't support bold, italics or other formatting. For that, use [RichTextLabel] instead.

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Returns the amount of lines of text the Label has.

method.name: get_line_height
method.description: Returns the font size in pixels.

method.name: get_total_character_count
method.description: Returns the total length of the text.

method.name: get_visible_characters
method.description: Returns the restricted number of characters to display. Returns -1 if unrestricted.

method.name: get_visible_line_count
method.description: Returns the number of lines shown. Useful if the [code]Label[/code] 's height cannot currently display all lines.

method.name: set_visible_characters
method.description: Restricts the number of characters to display. Set to -1 to disable.

members.member: Controls the text's horizontal align. Supports left, center, right, and fill, or justify. Set it to one of the [code]ALIGN_*[/code] constants.
If [code]true[/code], wraps the text inside the node's bounding rectangle. If you resize the node, it will change its height automatically to show all the text. Default: false.
If [code]true[/code], the Label only shows the text that fits inside its bounding rectangle. It also lets you scale the node down freely.
The node ignores the first [code]lines_skipped[/code] lines before it starts to display text.
Limits the lines of text the node shows on screen.
Limits the count of visible characters. If you set [code]percent_visible[/code] to 50, only up to half of the text's characters will display on screen. Useful to animate the text in a dialog box.
The text to display on screen.
If [code]true[/code], all the text displays as UPPERCASE.
Controls the text's vertical align. Supports top, center, bottom, and fill. Set it to one of the [code]VALIGN_*[/code] constants.

constants.constant: Expand row whitespaces to fit the width.
Align the whole text to the top.
Align the whole text to the center.
Align the whole text to the bottom.
Align the whole text by spreading the rows.
